title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
description:
WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie. Slate movie critic Dana Stevens and staff writer Bryan Curtis discuss the shameless ending of Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, and Keira Knightley.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
